post.description: Create a new student with authentication.

get.description: Get all students with pagination and optional filters.
Download sample Excel file for student bulk import with Vietnamese headers.

post.description:
Bulk import students from Excel file with Vietnamese headers.

Required columns (Vietnamese):
- H tn: Full name of the student
- Email: Email address
- M sinh vin: Student code (must be unique)
- Lp: Class name
- Khoa: Faculty name (must exist in system)
- Ngnh: Major name (must exist in system)
- Kha: Cohort name (must exist in system)

Optional columns (Vietnamese):
- S in thoi: Phone number
- a ch: Address
- Ngy sinh: Date of birth (YYYY-MM-DD format)
- Qu qun: Hometown

Password: 6-character random password generated for each student
Returns Excel file with imported data including generated passwords

get.description: Get student by ID.
Get student by student code.

post.description: Create a new teacher with authentication.

get.description: Get all teachers with pagination and optional filters.
Download sample Excel file for teacher bulk import with Vietnamese headers.

post.description:
Bulk import teachers from Excel file with Vietnamese headers.

Required columns (Vietnamese):
- H tn: Full name of the teacher
- Email: Email address
- Khoa: Faculty name (must exist in system)

Optional columns (Vietnamese):
- S in thoi: Phone number
- a ch: Address
- Ngy sinh: Date of birth (YYYY-MM-DD format)
- Qu qun: Hometown
- B mn: Department name (must exist in system if provided)

Password: 6-character random password generated for each teacher
Returns Excel file with imported data including generated passwords
